text: Say fewer words, as part of having the cool demeanor that I have, where nothing fazes me, and I am unperturbed by anybodies presence, be it prince or pauper.
Be a great listener, hear people first and fully, before speaking.
I have a moderate, gentle will when dealing with life and people, but can turn on the fire when I need to get work done, and direct my fire in the appropriate context.
